Mozilla

January Leaflet Tutorial Follow Up

Thanks to all that made it out to the Leaflet.js workshop in January!

The workshop materials have been compiled into a web tutorial so that you can continue learning at your own pace.

For further info, see the official Leaflet tutorials and the Maptime web mapping resources.

See you next month!

This website is open source and you can improve it. Learn more about contributing here.
